rukus.text: ttuleu san-eulo maengsehasa
gilogdoen seongseolo maengsehamyeo
geugeos-eun pyeolchyeojin yangpijie gilog doen geos-ila
gyeongbaehagi wihae bangmun-i jaj-eun ka-euba sinjeon-eulo maengsehamyeo
nop-eun haneullo maengsehamyeo
manjoga doen badalo maengsehanani
geudae junim-ui beol-eun bandeusi nae lil geos-ila
eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul pihal su eobsnola
haneul-i jindonghaneun nal
geuligo sandeul-i hwinallineun nal
geunal-eul geoyeoghan jadeul-ege jae ang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geudeul-eun heowie molduhan jadeullo
geunal-e solichimyeo buljieug-eulo kkeullyeogani
igeos-i balo neohuiga geoyeoghaess deon buljiog-ila malhayeo jideola
igeosdo masul-inyo animyeon neo huiga bojileul moshaneunyo
geugos-eulo deul-eoga masbola neohuiga geugeos-eul innaehadeon ttoneun innae haji moshadeon geugeos-eun neohui haeng-wie daehan bosang-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun eunhye ui cheongug-eulo deul-eoga
junimkkeseo geudeul-ege bepul chug bog-eul mankkighago ttohan geudeul-ui junim eun buljiog-ui eungbeollobuteo geudeul-eul bohohayeo jusinola
yuighago jeulgeoi meoggo masi la neohuiui haeng-wie daehan gyeolgwalaneun malsseum-i iss-eulila
geudeul-i chimsang-e juljieo gidae ni hananim-eun geudeul-ege nun-i keun aleumdaun baeujaleul anjge hasideola

mid-eum-eul gajin jawa geudeul-eul ttala mid-eum-eul gajin husondeul-i issnani hananim-eun husondeul-eul geudeulgwa hamkke gyeolhabsikyeo julila ttohan hananim-eun geudeul-i haenghan geosdeul-eul gamhaji anh-eul geos-ila modeun ingan-eun geuga haenghan geos-e daehan chaeg-im-i issnola
hananim-eun geudeul-i wonhaneun gwa silgwa yuglyuleul buyeohani
geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege hae ag-i eobsneun jan-eul jugo bad-eul ttae
jinjucheoleom jal bogwandoen sonyeon-i geudeul juwileul dolmyeo sijungdeuldoda
geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege da gaseomyeo anbuleul mul-eumae
sillo jeohuineun hyeonseeseo uli baegseongdeullo inhayeo dulyeowo haessnaidalago daedabdeul hanila
geuleona hananim-eun uliege eunhyeleul bepusa jag-yeolhaneun yeolpung-ui beollobuteo ulileul guhayeo jusyeossnola
sillo ulineun ijeon-e hananim kke guwonhayeoss-eumae geubun-eun eunhewa jabilo chungmanhasinila
